paragraphs.body: This is the page where formal requests for chat moderator rights can be filed. Chat moderator rights enable normal users to kick or ban other users on the wiki's chat. It is particularly useful on Avatar Wiki when an admin is unavailable to take action against comments or discussions that contravene the site's ${link_0}. There is no maximum number of chat moderators, so if you believe you deserve chat moderator rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.
paragraphs.text: This is the page where formal requests for chat moderator rights can be filed. Chat moderator rights enable normal users to kick or ban other users on the wiki's chat. It is particularly useful on Avatar Wiki when an admin is unavailable to take action against comments or discussions that contravene the site's discussion policy. There is no maximum number of chat moderators, so if you believe you deserve chat moderator rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.

paragraphs.body: Duke of Skibbington (wall · contribs · editcount · logs)
paragraphs.text: Duke of Skibbington (wall · contribs · editcount · logs)

paragraphs.body: I, the Duke of Skibbington am requesting chat moderator rights on the Avatar Wiki. I am very active and being from a different time zone, I can monitor the chat when others are asleep and give a nice overlap. I dare say, I am rather responsible, on the Doom Universe community, I am a moderator and have served to stop and destroy many a spam attack. Ask any frequent chatter, I am active and dedicated to the rules of the chat. I do think I could be a great help to the wiki. Duke of  Skibbington Fanon - Wall 22:10, May 15, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I, the Duke of Skibbington am requesting chat moderator rights on the Avatar Wiki. Ask any frequent chatter, I am active and dedicated to the rules of the chat. I do think I could be a great help to the wiki. Duke of  Skibbington Fanon - Wall 22:10, May 15, 2015 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: DaiLaiHeping am requesting chat moderator rights on the Avatar Wiki. I enjoy being part of this community and love the conversations there, and I would like to be able to monitor the chat to continue it being the enjoyable place for live discussions and conversation. Others have previously put my name down before to become chat moderator and personally I would enjoy to help in any way that I could to assist the community where I can - since I spend a lot of time on the Chat. Dailaiheping 19:07, May 26, 2015 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Me, a random guy from the Netherlands who goes by the Avatar Wiki username of CombustionNation, am requesting chat moderator rights on the Avatar Wiki. I am very active on this wiki, checking it at least once a day, and I am often found in the chat. I enjoy being on there and I hate it when spammers (who are returning now) try to crash the chat and no admin is around. I want to fight these spammers, and other people who misbehave. I will not misuse my powers, and I will only use them for a good reason. CombustionNation 19:29, May 26, 2015 (UTC)

paragraphs.text: Duke of Skibbington (wall · contribs · editcount · logs)

paragraphs.body: I wish to reapply for the position. I have proven myself, without reasonable doubt, to be an active user. I have also, on one occasion, stopped an argument between the users Bajator and Primerage and reported it. Therefore, I believe myself capable of the role. Since being declined on the first opportunity, I have ended three arguments and reported a user. Duke of  Skibbington Fanon - Wall 06:55, July 23, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I wish to reapply for the position. I have proven myself, without reasonable doubt, to be an active user. I have also, on one occasion, stopped an argument between the users Bajator and Primerage and reported it. Therefore, I believe myself capable of the role. Since being declined on the first opportunity, I have ended three arguments and reported a user. Duke of  Skibbington Fanon - Wall 06:55, July 23, 2015 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: After giving it a great deal of thought over the past few weeks, I would now like to formally request chat moderator privileges.
paragraphs.text: After giving it a great deal of thought over the past few weeks, I would now like to formally request chat moderator privileges.

paragraphs.body: I'm pretty active in the chat most days, as while I do work full time, I am still able to be in the chat throughout the day during the week. Not to toot my own horn, but I think of myself as usually being fairly level-headed, and have on occasions when things got a little heated requested that users be more civil, as well as reported improper behaviour on one occasions. I believe that I could fill that position effectively, and am fully aware of the requirements thereof and to be sure not to abuse this privilege, should it be granted. Thank you for your consideration. --DrachenRitter42 (wall • contribs) 21:19, September 16, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I'm pretty active in the chat most days, as while I do work full time, I am still able to be in the chat throughout the day during the week. paragraphs.body: Duke of Skibbington (wall · contribs · editcount · logs)
paragraphs.text: Duke of Skibbington (wall · contribs · editcount · logs)

paragraphs.body: I would like to apply for chat moderator again. The infamous troll has appeared for another time. Eventually, a moderator came to sort things out but only after just a few minutes shy of an hour. I am very active in the chat and often online around the time the troll decides to surface. Would you please consider my application? Duke of  Skibbington Fanon - Wall 20:00, May 31, 2016 (UTC)
